project.title: ThisMuch
project.description: A react native app that allows users to take pictures of there receipts, and divide them with friends.

project.title: Personal Portfolio
project.description: My personal portfolio, where I will keep my projects hosted. I really needed one

project.title: Demerit Tool
project.description: This is a tool that I built for a friend that created a simulated version of his fire academy demerit slip. It allowed him to edit it anywhere, and print it anywhere.

project.title: Computational Physics Labs - UNLV
project.description: This github repo hosts my labs that I completed when I was in my Physics degree at UNLV. These labs include fourier transforms, time series and differential series graphs and predictions, as well as modeling chaotic and thermal systems.
